column5: Morning Open Thread is a daily copyrighted post from a host of editors and guest writers. We support our community invite and share ideas and encourage thoughtful respectful dialogue in an open forum. I’ve been given the task of hosting the Sunday edition of the MOT time.  I am not sure what we will discover today.  Let’s see what we can explore. The diarist gets to sleep in if she so desires and can show up long after the post is published. So you know it's a feature not a bug. Join us please.
